column2: aprannyprannychiungraa luuakhwangare krennyaacaatam

luukhapsim-i myiuriugunnsikkhaanhangtakwa luutiungannyiiamyhakhancaakhwangrhisanny akhwangaremyaakiu asiamhatprukhrangsanny luukhapsim-ilwatlapmhu, taraamyhatamhu, ngrimkhyammhutiu-i akhrekhanautmracphracseaakreaanglannykeaang,

luuakhwangremyaakiu aremathaa mathiilecaaprukhrangsanny luukhapsim-i akyangsikkhaakiu khyiupheaak phyakchiitatsanny rakcakkramkrutseaa apruamhumyaakiu phracpeaacekhaiseaakreaanglannykeaang, lwatlapcwaa phwanghapreaachiuniungmhu lwatlapcwaa sakwang yunkrannyniungmhu, kreaakrwankhrang, khyiungaikhrangtiumha kanglwatcwaa asakmweniungmhutiukiu khancaarayuuniungcemanny leaakatackhu peaapeaaklaaranarekiu luukhapsimtiuka mimitiu-i athaksanchunseaa liulaakhyakchandakriiaphracphrang krwekreaakrennyaaprii phracseaakreaang lannykeaang,

luukhapsimtiusanny, taraalaklwat nhipcakkaluuprumhu, aupciumhunhang phicii nnyhanypanmhu tiukiu neaakchun malwhaisaa marheaangsaa laknak cwaikiungkaa teaalhankhrang, punkankhrangmapruceran, luuakhwangre myaakiuupadephrang thinsimkaakway peramannyphracseaakreaang lannykeaang,

niungngan akhyangkhyang khyackhangrangnhiicwaa chakchanrekiu piumiutiutakceran krancheaangramannyphracseaakreaang lannykeaang, kambhaakulasamaggaaphwaiwangtiusanny muulaluuakhwangaremyaakiu lannykeaang, luu-i gunnsikkhaakiu lannykeaang, yeaakyaa minmatiu-i tuunnyiisanny akhwangaremyaakiu lannykeaang, lecaayunkrannypaasanny hukulasamaggatwang thapman-jwe atannypru priisannyprang, luumhukriipwaa tiutakrenhangtakwa piumiu lwatlap keaangmwanseaa luubhawa achangatantiukiu mrhangtangran sannitttthaankhyaprii phracseaakreaang lannykeaang,

kambhaakulasamaggaaphwaiwang niungngantiusanny kulasamaggaaphwainhangpuupeaang-jwe luuakhwangaremyaakiulannykeaang, akhrekhanlwatlapkhwang akhwangaremyaakiulannykeaang, kambhaatawhamluntwang riuselecaa kyangsunceaangcannykrakhrangkiu aaapemannyhu katiprupriiphracseaakreaang lannykeaang,
thiukreaang
athwethwennyiilaakhan ka

aprannyprannychiungraaluuakhwangrekrennyaacaatamkiu luutiung aphwai acannytiungsanny acany nhalunswanglyak kambhaa tawhamluntwang achiupaa akhwangaremyaanhang lwatlap khwangmyaakiu riuselecaakraceran chunma swansangkhrangphrang aaathut kraramannyhulannykeaang, kulasamaggaaphwaiwangniungnganmyaanhang thiuniungngantiu-iaaannaapiungatwangrhi naypaychiungraa tiungsuuprannysaa myaaaaa achiupaa akhwangarenhang lwatlapkhwangmyaakiu kyaykyaypranpran thireaakcwaa simhatkyangsun ceaangcannykraceran prannytwangprannypachiungraa tiutakseaa cheaangrwakkhyakmyaaphrang aaathutkraramannyhulannykeaang rannyrwaypriilyhang luuakhwangare myaachiungraa aprannyprannychiungraa krennyaacaatamkiu niungngankhapsim, luukhapsimtiu taprennyiicwaa cheaangrwak niungkracimseaanghaa yakhuthutpran krennyaaliuksanny.
apiud 1

luutiungsanny tuunnyii lwatlapseaa gunnsikkhaaphrang lannykeaang, tuunnyiilwatlapseaa akhwangaremyaaphrang lannykeaang, mwephwaalaasuumyaa phracsanny. thiusuutiu-nai piungkhraa wephantatseaa nyaannnhang kyangwat sitatseaa cittiurhikra-jwe thiusuutiusanny akhyangkhyang mettaathaa-jwe chakchankyangsunsang-i.
apiud 2

luutiungsanny luuakhwang are krennyaacaatamtwang pheaaprathaasanny akhwangare aaalun, lwatlapkhwang aaaluntiukiu piungchiung khancaakhwangrhisanny. luumyiunwayaaaphrang phracce, asaaareaangaaaphrang phracce, kyaa, ma, sabhaawaaaaphrang phracce, bhaasaacakaaaaaphrang phracce, kiukwaysanny bhaasaaaaaphrang phracce, niungnganreyuuchakhyak, siutannymahut akhraayuuchakhyakaaaphrang phracce, niungngannhang chiungseaa, siutannymahut luumhuachangatannhang chiungseaa jacmrac aaaphrangphracce, paccanny uccaa gunnaaaphrang phracce, myiuriujaatiaaaphrang phracce, akhraa achangatan aaaphrang phracce khwaikhraakhrangmarhicera.

thiuprang luutacuu tacyeaak nethiungraa niungngan-i siutannymahut naymredesa-i niungnganrechiungraa phracce ciirang piungkhwangchiungraa phracce tiungpranny akhyangkhyang chiungraaphracce, achangatan tackhukhukiu akhrepru-jwe seaalannykeaang, desanaymretackhusanny akhyupakhraa aaannaapiung lwatlapsanny naymre, siutannymahut kulasamagga thinsim ceaangrheaak thaarasanny naymre, siutannymahut kiuypiung aupkhyupkhwang aaannaatiu tacittadesaleaaksaa rarhisanny naymre casaphrang yangsiu seaa naymremyaa phracsanny, phracsanny huuseaa akreaangkiu atheaakathaa pru-jwe seaalannykeaang khwaikhraakhrang lunwa marhicera.
apiud 3
luutiung-nai asakrhangran lwatlapkhwangnhang lunkhruncitkhyakhwang rhisanny.
apiud 4

mannysuukiumyha kyekywanaphrac, siutannymahut aceapaaaphrac, niungthakciinang cekhiungkhrang maprura, luukiu kyekywan saphway adhamma cekhiungkhrang, areaangaway prukhrangnhang thiusabheaa sakreaakseaa lupnganhuusamyhakiu pitpang taamrac ramanny.
apiud 5
mannysuukiumyha nnyhanypannhipcakkhrang, siutannymahut rakcakkramkrutcwaa luumachancwaa gunnngayceseaachakchanmhu maprura, siutannymahut apracdann pekhrangmaprura.
apiud 6
luutiungtwang upadearaa-nai luupuggiultacuu aphracphrang araakhapsimtwang asiamhat prukhrangkiu khanyuupiungkhwangrhisanny.
apiud 7

luuaaaluntiusanny upadearaa-nai tuunnyiikrasannyaprang, upade-i akaaakwaykiu khraanaakhrang makhanracebhai tuunnyiicwaa khancaapiungkhwangrhisanny. iikrennyaa caatampaa sabheaataraamyaakiu phiichan-jwe khwaikhraakhrangmha lannykeaang, thiusiukhwaikhraakhrangkiu lhuncheaakhrangmha lannykeaang, kanglwat ceran akaaakwaykiu tuunnyiicwaa khancaapiungkhwang rhisanny.
apiud 8

phwaicannypun akhrekhanupadeka seaalannykeaang akhraa upadeka seaalannykeaang luutiungatwak pethaasanny akhrekhan akhwangare myaasanny khyiupheaak phyakchiikhrangkhankhairalyhang thiusiu khyiupheaakphyakchiiseaa prulupmhukreaang phracpeaalaaseaa nacnaakhyak atwak thiusuusanny niungnganchiungraa aaannaapiungtaraaruntwang thireaakcwaa saksaa khwangraniungceramanny.
apiud 9
mannysuumyha upadeara mahutseaa phamchiikhrangkiu phracce, khyupnheaangkhrangkiu phracce, prannynhangkhrangkiu phracce makhancera.
apiud 10

akhwangaremyaanhang taawan wattaraamyaakiu achunaphratkhanraatwang lannykeaang, pracmhukreaang taraacwaichiu ciirangchunphratkhanraatwang lannykeaang, luutiungsanny lwatlap-jwe bhakmaliukseaa taraarunteaa-i luuamyaa rhemheaaktwang myhatacwaa kraanaacacchekhrangkiu tuunnyiicwaa khancaapiungkhwangrhisanny.
apiud 11

luuamyaa rhemheaak-nai upadeatiung cacche-jwe pracmhukyuulwansannyhu thangrhaa ciirangkhrangkhanrasanny akhyinathi pracmhunhang taraacwaichiukhrang khanrasuutiungsanny apracmaisuuhuu-jwe yuuchakhrangkhanthiuksanny akhwangarerhisanny. thiuamhukiu kraanaacaccheraaway cwapcwaikhanrasanny pracmhuatwak khukhankhyepaniungran liuapseaa akhwangaremyaakiu thiusuuaaa peprii phracceramanny.

luutacuutacyeaakaaa niungnganupadearaphracce, aprannyprannychiungraa upadeara phracce, pracmhumamreaakseaa luprap siumahut pyakkwakmhuara chwaichiupracpekhrang maprura. thiuaprang pracmhukyuulwancanyakhaaka thiuksangceniungseaa apracdannthakpiumiukriileseaa apracdannkiu thiuksangkhrangmarhicera.
apiud 12

mannysuumyha mimisabheaaatiung aekhyamlwatlapcwaa nethiungkhrangkiu seaalannykeaang, mimi-i misaacukiu seaalannykeaang, mimi-i neaim asiukawankiu seaalannykeaang, caapecaayuukiu seaalannykeaang, upadeara mahutseaa wangreaak cwakphakkhrang makhancera. thiuprang mimi-igunnsikkhaa kiulanny athakpaaatiung putkhatkhrang makhancera. luutiungtwang thiusiu wangreaakcwakphakkhrangmha seaalannykeaang putkhatkhrangmha seaalannykeaang upadeara kaakway piungkhwangrhisanny.
apiud 13
luutiungtwang mimi-iniungngan naynimit atwang-nai lwatlapcwaa swaalaa rwhepreaang niungkhwang, nethiungkhwangrhisanny.
luutiungtwang miminethiungraa tiungprannymha lannykeaang, akhraatiungprannymhalannykeaang thwakkhwaa swaapiungkhwangrhisannyaprang, mimi-i tiungprannysiu pranlaa piungkhwanglannyrhisanny.
apiud 14
luutiungsanny nnyhanypan nhipcak khannerakhrangmha lwatkangran akhraatiungpranny myaa-nai aekhyamcwaa khiulhunneniungkhwangrhisanny.

niungnganrenhang mapatsaksanny pracmhumyaamha seaalannykeaang, kulasamagga-i rannyrwakkhyaknhang sabheaataraa mhumyaakiu phiichanseaa amhumyaamha seaalannykeaang, amhan peaapeaak laaseaa pracmhukreaang taraacwaichiukhrang khanrasanny amhuakhangmyaatwang athakpaa akhwangarekiu asunmapruniungcera.
apiud 15
luutiungsanny, niungngan tacniungngan-i niungngansaaaphrac khanyuukhwangrhisanny.
upadeara mahutlyhang mannysuumyha mimi-i niungngansaaaphrackiu cwanlwhatkhrang makhancera, niungngansaaaphrac preaanglainiungseaa akhwangarekiu lanny ngrangpaykhrang makhancera.
apiud 16

arwayreaak priiseaa yeaakyaa nhang minmatiutwang luumyiukiu seaalannykeaang, niungngansaaaphrackiu seaalannykeaang, kiukwaysanny bhaasaakiu seaalannykeaang, akreaangpru-jwe khyupkhyay kansatkhrang marhibhai, thimmraaniungkhwang nhang misaacu thuutheaangniungkhwangrhisanny. achiupaa yeaakyaanhang minma tiusanny langmayaaaphrac peaangsangnecany akhyin atwang-nai seaalannykeaang, aimtheaangkiu phyaksim-jwe kwaarhangkrasanny akhaa-nailannykeaang, lakthap peaangsang aimtheaangprukhrang nhang caplyanyseaa tuunnyiisanny akhwangaremyaakiu rarhithiuksanny.
satiusaa nhang satiusamii nhacuunhacbhak-i lwatlapseaa sabheaachandarhimhasaalyhang thimmraakhrangkiu pruramanny.
misaacu tackhusanny luuaphwaiacanny-i sabhaawakyaseaa akhrekhanaphwaitacrapphracsanny, thiumisaacusanny luu aphwaiacannynhang aciuratiu-i kaakwayceaangrheaakkhrangkiu khanyuukhwangrhisanny.
apiud 17
luutiungtwang mimitacuu khyangseaalannykeaang, akhraasuumyaanhang phakcap-jwe seaalannykeaang, paccannyuccaa tiukiu piungchiungran akhwangarerhiramanny.
upadeara mahutlyhang, mannysuumyha mimi-i paccannyuccaapiungchiungkhwangkiu cwanlwhatkhrang makhancera.
apiud 18

luutiungtwang lwatlapcwaa twekheaa kranchaniungkhwang, lwatlapcwaa khanyuuraptannyniungkhwang nhang lwatlapcwaa sakwang kiukwayniungkhwangrhisanny. achiupaa akhwangaremyaa-nai mimikiukwaysanny bhaasaakiu siutannymahut sakwangyunkrannykhyakkiu lwatlapcwaa preaanglainiungkhwang paawangsanny aprang mimitacyeaak khyangphracce, akhraasuumyaanhang cupeaang-jwephracce, prannysuuamyaa rhemheaaktwang seaalannykeaang, rhemheaaktwang mahutbhai seaalannykeaang, mimi kiukwayseaa bhaasaakiu siutannymahut sakwang yunkrannykhyakkiu lwatlapcwaa sangpraniungkhwang, kyangsunniungkhwang, watprukiukwayniungkhwangnhang cheaaktanny niungkhwangtiulanny paawangsanny.
apiud 19

luutiungtwang lwatlapcwaa thangmrang yuuchaniungkhwangnhang lwatlapcwaa phwangha pheaapraniungkhwangrhisanny. achiupaa akhwangaremyaa-nai anheaang ayhakmarhibhai lwatlapcwaa thangmrangyuuchaniungkhwang paawang sannyaprang, niungngannaynimitmyaakiu theaakthaaran maliubhai satangakreaangaraanhang sabheaataraamyaakiu tanannynannyphrang lwatlapcwaa rhaayuuchannypuuniungkhwang, lakkhanniungkhwangnhang wengha phrankhyiikhwangtiulanny paawangsanny.
apiud 20
luutiungtwang lwatlap aekhyamcwaa cuweniungkhwang nhang phwaicannyniungkhwang tiu rhisanny.
mannysuukiumyha aphwaiacannytackhusiu wangceran atangakyapmaprura.
apiud 21
luutiungtwang miminiungngan-i aupkhyupre-nai kiuytiungphracce, lwatlapcwaa rwekhyayliuksanny kiuycaalhaymyaamha tacchangphracce paawang cheaangrwakniungkhwang rhisanny.
luutiungtwang mimi-iniungnganrhi prannysuu wanthamaphwai-nai wangreaakniungran tuunnyiisannyakhwang arerhisanny.

prannysuuprannysaatiu-i chandasanny aupkhyup aaannaa-i akhrekhanphracramanny, achiupaa chandakiu akhyinkaalapiungkhraalyak cacmhanseaarwekeaakpwaimyaaphrang thangrhaaceramanny. rwekeaak pwaimyaatwanglanny luutiungannyiiamyha chandamai peniungkhwang rhiramannyaprang, thiurwekeaakpwaimyaakiu lyhiuwhak maipe canacphrang phracce, alaatuu lwatlapseaa maipecanac phrangphracce, kyangparamanny.
apiud 22

luutiungtwang luuaphwaiacanny-i aphwaiwangtacuuanenhang luumhure lunkhrunkhwangrayuupiungkhwangrhisannyaprang niungnganrekriupammhuphrangphracce, niungngantakaa puupeaangcheaangrwakmhuphrangphracce, niungnganasiisii-iphwaicannypunnhang lannykeaang, sayanjaataangaaanhanglannykeaang thiuluu-i gunnsikkhaanhang cariuklakkhannaa lwatlapcwaa tiutakmrangmaareatwak marhimaphracliuapseaa ciipwaare, luumhurenhang yanykyemhu akhwangaremyaakiu suncwaipiungkhwangrhisanny.
apiud 23

luutiungtwang aluplup ranlannykeaang, miminhacsakraa asakmwemhu alup akiungkiu lwatlapcwaarwekhyayran lannykeaang, taraa myhata-jwe luppyeaaseaa alupkhwang-i akhreanekiu rarhiran lannykeaang, aluplakmai phracrakhrangmha akaaakway rarhiran lannykeaang akhwangarerhisanny.
luutiungtwang khwaikhraakhrangmakhanracebhai, tuunnyiiseaa alupatwak tuunnyiiseaa akhakrengwe raniungkhwangrhisanny.

aluplupkiungsanny luutiungtwang, miminhang mimi-i misaacuatwak luugunnsikkhaa nhang nnyiiaeaang nethiung caaseaakniungran, citkhyaleaaksannyprang, taraa myhata-jwe luppyeaasanny lacaakrengwe rapiungkhwangrhisanny. liuapkhailyhangakhraa nannylammyaamha luumhure atheaakapankiulanny thapman-jwe raniungkhwang rhisanny.
luutiungtwang mimiakyiu khancaakhwangkiu kaakwayran alupsamaa acannyarunmyaa phwaicannykhwang, paawang cheaangrwakkhwang rhisanny.
apiud 24

luutiungtwang sangmratlyeaakancwaa kansatthaasanny aluplupkhyin aprang, lacaanhangtakwa akhaakaalaaaalyeaacwaa satmhat thaasanny alup aaalaprakmyaapaawangsanny anaayuukhwangnhang aaalapkhwang khancaapiungkhwang rhisanny.
apiud 25

luutiungtwang miminhangtakwa mimi-i misaacukyanmaarenhangtakwa kiuycitnhacphraa aekhyamcwaa nethiungniungre atwak acaaahaara, awatathanny neaim, chewaa akuuannyiinhang liuapsanny luumhu atheaakapanmyaa paawangseaa sangteaa lyheaakpatsanny luumhu achangatankiu rayuukhancaakhwang rhisanny. thiuprang aluplakmaiphracseaa akhaa-nai seaalannykeaang, makyanmamaaphracseaa akhaa-nai seaalannykeaang, kiuyanggaamacwammasanphracseaa akhaa-nai seaalannykeaang, muchiumaphracseaa akhaa-nai seaalannykeaang, asakarwayaiumangseaa akhaa-nai seaalannykeaang, mimikiuytiungka matatniungseaaakreaangkreaang wamcaa rhaamhiiniungseaanannylam marhiseaa akhaa-nai seaalannykeaang, nethiungcaaseaakreatwak lunkhruncitkhyaramhu akhwangarerhisanny.

saasanny mikhangmyaanhang kalemyaasanny athuuceaangrheaakkhrangnhang akuuannyiipekhrangkiu rakhwang rhisanny. upadeara thimmraakhrangphrangphracce akhraa nannyphrang phracce mwephwaaseaa kaleaaalunsanny tuunnyiiseaa luumhu kaakway ceaangrheaakrekiu rayuu khancaakraramanny.
apiud 26

luutiungsanny pannyaasang yuuniungkhwangrhisanny, anannychunmuulatannhang akhrekhan achang atanmyaatwang pannyaa sangkraaresanny akhamaiphracramanny. muulatanpannyaasanny masangmanera pannyaa phracramanny. cakmhulakmhupannyaanhang asakmwemhu pannyaamyaakiu yebhuuyyaaaaphrang sangkraarayuuniungceramanny. thiuprang athaktanpannyaaatwak arannyakhyangkiu akhrekhanpru-jwe tuunnyiiseaa akhwangare rarhiceramanny.

pannyaasangkraarekiu luusaatiu-icariuklakkhannaaaprannyawatiutakmhu aprang, luuakhwangarenhang akhrekhanlwatlapkhwang riuse lecaamhu tiukiu rhangsanphwanphriulaaceran rannyrway-jwe sangkraa ceramanny. pannyaasangkraaresanny niungngan aaalun tiutwang lannykeaang, luumyiucumyaa twanglannykeaang, bhaasaareasangaphwaimyaatwang lannykeaang, akhyangkhyangnaalannymhu, sannykhan mhunhang khangmangrangnhiimhutiukiu aaaperamanny. thiuprang ngrimkhyamre tannytanaeaang cheaangrwakran aliunghaa, kulasamagga-i cheaangrwakmhumyaakiulanny phracmreaak aeaang aaaperamanny.
mibhatiutwang, mimitiu-i kalemyaa sangyuuramanny pannyaa amyiuacaakiu rwekhyayniungseaa lakuu akhwangarerhisanny.
apiud 27

luutiungtwang sakchiungraa yanykyemhu leaaka-nai lwatlapcwaa paawangcheaang rwakniungkhwang sukhumapannyaarap myaakiu lwatlapcwaaliukcaa mwelyeaaniungkhwang, sippan pannyaathwankaare lupnganmyaatwang lwatlapcwaa wangreaak lupkiung niungkhwangnhang thiupannyaa-i akyiu aaanisangmyaakiu lwatlapcwaa khancaasuncwainiungkhwang rhisanny.

luutiungtwang sippanmha phracce, caapemhaphracce, sukhumapannyaamha phracce, mimikiuypiungnyaannphrang krancannyphantiimhumha phracthwanlaasanny gunnnhang ngwekre akyiuamratmyaakiu khancaarayuuniungran akhwangareatwak kaakwaymhukiu rarhiran akhwangare rhisanny.
apiud 28

luutiungsanny iikrennyaa caatamtwang pheaaprathaasanny akhwangaremyaa nhang lwatlapkhwangmyaakiu aprannyacun rayuuniungseaa luumhuchakchanre akhreanenhang aprannyprannychiungraa chakchanre akhreanetiu-i akyiukyejuukiu khancaaniungkhwang rhisanny.
apiud 29
mimi-icariuklakkhannaa lwatlapcwaa phwanphriutiutakniungsanny tackhutannyseaa luuasiukawan atwakluutiung-nai taawan rhisanny.

mimi-i akhwangaremyaanhang lwatlap khwangmyaakiu suncwairaatwang luutiungsanny, akhraasuumyaa-i akhwangaremyaanhang lwatlapkhwangmyaakiuasiamhatpru-jwe riuselecaaceranaliunghaa lannykeaang, diimiukareciikyangsunseaaluuaphwaiacannytwang kiuykyangtaraaaprang, raprwaaaekhyamsaayaarenhang prannysuu akyiu ciipwaa phracthwanretiu atwak, taraamyhatacwaakyang cheaangran aliunghaa lannykeaang, upadeka pratthaanthaasanny khyupkhyaymhumyaaphrangsaa kansatkhrangkhanramanny.
achiupaa akhwangaremyaanhang lwatlap khwangmyaakiu mannysanny amhukiccatwangmyha kulasamagga-i rannyrwaykhyakmyaanhang lannykeaang, akhrekhanmuumyaanhang lannykeaang chankyang-jwe masuncwaira.
apiud 30

iikrennyaacaatampaa akhwangarenhangtakwa lwatlapkhwangmyaa pyakciiraapyakciikreaangtiukiurannyrway-jwe, niungngan tacniungngan atwak phracce, luutaccu atwakphracce, luutacuutacyeaak atwak phracce paawang cheaangrwakran akhwangrhisannyhu seaalannykeaang, kiuytiungcheaangrwakran akhwangrhisannyhuseaalannykeaang adhippaay piungkhraakeaakyuukhrang marhicera.
